button.title: Knop
button.description: knoppen en andere items die geen status hebben.

coffeemachine.title: Koffiemachine
coffeemachine.description: koffiemachines zijn kooktoestellen voor het zetten van koffie.

curtain.title: Gordijnen
curtain.description: elektrische gordijnen, deze bewegen het gordijn over een rails.

doorbell.title: Deurbel
doorbell.description: deurbellen, en apparaten welke aankondigen dat er op een knop is gedrukt.

garagedoor.title: Garagedeur
garagedoor.description: garagedeuren en andere automatische deur en poort openers.

heater.title: Verwarmer
heater.description: Verwarmers en andere apparaten welke je huis verwarmen.

homeenergymonitor.title: Energiemonitor
homeenergymonitor.description: Apparaat die je energie verbruik bijhoud.

kettle.title: Waterkoker
kettle.description: waterkokers en andere apparaten die water verwarmen.

lock.title: Slot
lock.description: apparaat met of voor een slot.

other.title: Overig
other.description: apparaten die niet in een andere klasse passen.

relay.title: Relais
relay.description: relais welke zijn verbonden met een ander apparaat .

remote.title: Afstandsbediening
remote.description: TV, jaloezieën, sleutelhanger of elk type afstandsbediening.

sensor.title: Sensor
sensor.description: contact, beweging, vuur, CO of elk type sensor. Evenals alarmen!

speaker.title: Speaker
speaker.description: apparaten die audio kunnen afspelen, zoals muziek.

thermostat.title: Thermostaat
thermostat.description: thermostaten, voor het hele huis of op een radiator.

vacuumcleaner.title: Stofzuiger
vacuumcleaner.description: geautomatiseerde apparaten die vloeren op verzoek reinigen.

windowcoverings.title: Raambekleding
windowcoverings.description: raambekleding, voor het geval de klassen 'gordijnen', 'jaloezieën' of 'jaloezieën' niet van toepassing zijn.

all.title: On if all on
all.description: On if all devices are on. otherwise off
all.brief: on if all devices are on

any.title: On if any on
any.description: On if any devices are on
any.brief: on if any devices are on

highest.title: Highest Value
highest.description: The highest value of the all the grouped devices

ignore.title: Ignore Devices
ignore.description: Don't update, only use values set by the card
ignore.brief: the last value set in the app

lowest.title: Lowest Value
lowest.description: The lowest value of the all the grouped devices

max.title: Maximum value
max.description: The value of the device with the largest value

mean.title: Mean Average
mean.description: The average your are used to (sum/count)

median.title: Median Average
median.description: The value of the device in the middle

min.title: Minimum Value
min.description: The value of the device with the smallest value

mode.title: Mode Average
mode.description: The value which the most devices has

most.title: Most Devices
most.description: On if at least half devices are on

never.title: Never On
never.description: Never on, always returns to off

none.title: On unless all on
none.description: Off if all devices are on, otherwise on

sum.title: Total Value
sum.description: The sum of all the grouped device values

nor.title: On if None on
nor.description: On if all devices are off, otherwise off
nor.brief: on if none no devices are on

xor.title: On unless all on or off
xor.description: Off when all devices are off or all devices are on
xor.brief: on unless all devices are on or all off

onoff.title: Turned on
onoff.description: Whether a device is on or off.

dim.title: Dim level
dim.description: Dims level of a device as a percentage of its full value

light_temperature.title: Color Temperature
light_temperature.description: The white light temperature warm to cold as a decimal

light_mode.title: Light mode
light_mode.description: Switch between Color or Temperature mode

vacuumcleaner_state.title: Vacuum cleaner state
vacuumcleaner_state.description: The state of a a vacuum cleaner, either it is cleaning, spot cleaning, docked, charging or stopped

thermostat_mode.title: Thermostat mode
thermostat_mode.description: Mode of the thermostat, either it is set to auto, heat, cool or off.

target_temperature.title: Target temperature
target_temperature.description: Set the temperature which a device should target

measure_wind_strength.title: Wind Strength
measure_wind_strength.description: Wind Strength in Kilometer per hour (km/h)

measure_gust_strength.title: Gust Strength
measure_gust_strength.description: Gust Strength n Kilometer per hour (km/h)

measure_water.title: Water
measure_water.description: Water flow in Liters per minute (L/min)

alarm_contact.title: Contact Alarm
alarm_contact.description: Alarms when a Contact sensor is severed, e.g. when window or door is opened

alarm_co.title: CO Alarm
alarm_co.description: Alarms when dangerous CO values have been detected

alarm_co2.title: CO₂ Alarm
alarm_co2.description: Alarms when dangerous CO₂ values have been detected

alarm_pm25.title: PM2.5 Alarm
alarm_pm25.description: Alarms when PM2.5 values exceeds threshold

alarm_tamper.title: Tamper Alarm
alarm_tamper.description: Alarms when tampering has been detected

alarm_smoke.title: Smoke Alarm
alarm_smoke.description: Alarms when smoke has been detected

alarm_fire.title: Fire Alarm
alarm_fire.description: Alarms when fire has been detected

alarm_heat.title: Heat Alarm
alarm_heat.description: Alarms when extreme heat has been detected

alarm_water.title: Water Alarm
alarm_water.description: Alarms when water has been detected

alarm_battery.title: Battery Alarm
alarm_battery.description: Alarms when there is a battery warning, generally low battery

alarm_night.title: Night Alarm
alarm_night.description: Alarms when it is night time

homealarm_state.title: Home Alarm state
homealarm_state.description: Switch between armed, disarmed and partially armed

locked.title: Locked
locked.description: True when the lock is locked

lock_mode.title: Lock mode
lock_mode.description: Switch between Always locked, always unlocked and locked until unlocked modes

windowcoverings_state.title: Window Coverings State
windowcoverings_state.description: Whether a window cover is up, down or idle

windowcoverings_tilt_set.title: Window Coverings Tilt Set
windowcoverings_tilt_set.description: Set the tilt value of the window covering

windowcoverings_set.title: Window Coverings Set
windowcoverings_set.description: Set the position of window coverings. 0% is closed, 100% is open

speaker_playing.title: Speaker Playing
speaker_playing.description: What the speaker is currently playing.

speaker_repeat.title: Speaker Repeat
speaker_repeat.description: Set the repeat type, none, track or playlist.

speaker_artist.title: Speaker Artist
speaker_artist.description: Which artist the speaker is currently playing.

speaker_album.title: Speaker Album
speaker_album.description: Which album the speaker is currently playing.

speaker_track.title: Speaker Track
speaker_track.description: Which track the speaker is currently playing.

speaker_duration.title: Speaker Duration
speaker_duration.description: Which duration of the current item.

_.Sorry: Sorry you have not created any groups yet, please create a group and come back to edit it.
_.sorry: Sorry je hebt nog geen groepen gecreëerd, maak eerst een groep aan en kom daarna terug om deze aan te passen.

capabilities.title: Selecteer de mogelijkheden van de groep

devices.title: Selecteer de apparaten voor deze groep
devices.loading: Ik verzamel al de apparaten met deze mogelijkheden

empty.title: Sorry geen apparaten gevonden
empty.description: We kunnen geen apparaten vinden met deze mogelijkheden, druk op ‘vorige’ om terug te gaan.

group.title: Er word een groep gecreëerd met jou apparaten..
group.loading: Het toevoegen van deze nieuwe groep duurt een paar seconden.

settings.empty: Sorry je hebt nog geen groepen gecreëerd, maak eerst een groep aan en kom daarna terug om deze aan te passen.
